verses.name: Hebrews 13:10
verses.text: We have an altar, whereof they have no right to eat which serve the tabernacle.

verses.name: Hebrews 13:11
verses.text: For the bodies of those beasts, whose blood is brought into the sanctuary by the high priest for sin, are burned without the camp.

verses.name: Hebrews 13:12
verses.text: Wherefore Jesus also, that he might sanctify the people with his own blood, suffered without the gate.

verses.name: Hebrews 13:13
verses.text: Let us go forth therefore unto him without the camp, bearing his reproach.

verses.name: Hebrews 13:14
verses.text: For here have we no continuing city, but we seek one to come.
